short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: See Margin, BSR, ASIN, Size, etc. on an Amazon search page! All crucial data available right as you search for or browse products.
short.de: Siehe Rand, BSR, ASIN, Größe usw. auf einer Amazon-Suchseite! Alle wichtigen Daten sind direkt verfügbar, wenn Sie nach Produkten…
short.fr: Voir Marge, BSR, ASIN, Taille, etc. sur une page de recherche Amazon! Toutes les données cruciales seront disponibles dès que vous…
short.ru: Получите важные данные о каждом продукте на странице результатов Amazon. Выберите лучший продукт для продажи с прибылью.
short.zh_CN: 在亞馬遜搜索頁面上查看保證金，BSR，ASIN，大小等！ 搜索或瀏覽產品時，所有關鍵數據都將可用。 此外，無需使用任何工具即可獲得獨家新聞。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
With Quick View Extension by AMZScout, you can easily compare the products right on the Amazon pages. You now can choose the best item to sell with all the data right in front of you. There is no need to pull up extensions anymore. Simply type in a niche and enjoy viewing the full information.



Quick View will show you:
+ BSR and its history
+ Price history
+ The best Keywords
+ Which sellers sell the product
- FBA (and their number)
- FBM (and their number)
- Amazon itself sells it
- Amazon Warehouse deals
+ The product’s FBA fees
+ The date it became available
+ Profit margin
+ Listing quality
+ ASIN
+ Size
+ Weight

This works on all major marketplaces.
long.de,fr,ru,zh_CN:
With the AMZScout Quick View Extension, you can easily compare products right on the Amazon search results page. You now can choose the best product to sell, with all the data you need right in front of you. There is no need to pull up extensions anymore. Simply type in a niche and enjoy the full information.

Quick View will show you:
+ Which sellers sell the product
- FBA (and their number)
- FBM (and their number)
- Amazon itself sells it
- Amazon Warehouse deals
+ The product’s FBA fees
+ The date it became available
+ BSR and its history
+ Profit margin
+ Listing quality
+ ASIN
+ Size
+ Weight
